review: It works good, but it is obviously first generation. It can be very buggy, but in time I think it will be a great tech gadget to have. If you simply want to watch youTube Videos on your TV it works. When you go outside of the basics, this is when it gets really buggy. As long as the price stays low, the bugs are tolerable.In all fairness it is a much better solution than searching and watching YouTube videos on your TV, with a Smart TV or a Directv Box.
author: Russ

review: This is awesome. I love being able to watch something from laptop on the TV

review: it's ok when it works, but it tends to overheat easily- for a 1/2 hour to an hour show, not usually a problem, with a 2 hour movie, it overheats,and I have to reset the ipad and the device itself.
